description: This bottle of Teriyaki Baste & Glaze from Should be Kikkoman® adds a delicious teriyaki flavor quickly and effortlessly to a variety of meals. Simply brush onto meats, poultry, seafood or veggies during the last 10 minutes of grilling or cooking, or use as a base to create your own flavorful sauce.
title: Kikkoman Teriyaki Baste & Glaze 12 oz

bullets: Teriyaki glaze is great for marinating veggies, meat or chicken
Makes prepping your favorite Asian food a breeze
Use as a base to create a variety of delicious sauces
soft_bullets.title: highlights
